comment: Resistance types telling me they're just like the Iranians who are protesting ... let me break this down . Iranians are protesting for their freedom . They could get killed for it . You are protesting for free stuff . You just get mocked for it . Take a seat .
amr:
# ::snt Resistance types telling me they're just like the Iranians who are protesting ... let me break this down . Iranians are protesting for their freedom . They could get killed for it . You are protesting for free stuff . You just get mocked for it . Take a seat .
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (t / tell-01
            :ARG0 (t2 / type
                  :mod (r / resist-01))
            :ARG1 (r2 / resemble-01
                  :ARG1 t2
                  :ARG2 (p / person
                        :mod (c / country
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Iran"))
                        :ARG0-of (p2 / protest-01))
                  :mod (j / just))
            :ARG2 (ii / i))
      :snt2 (l / let-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (b / break-down-27
                  :ARG0 ii
                  :ARG1 (t3 / this)))
      :snt3 (p3 / protest-01
            :ARG0 p
            :mod c)
      :ARG1 (f / free-04
            :ARG1 p)
      :snt4 (p4 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (k / kill-01
                  :ARG1 (t4 / they)
                  :ARG1-of (c2 / cause-01
                        :ARG0 (ii2 / it))))
      :snt5 (p5 / protest-01
            :ARG0 (y2 / you)
            :ARG1 (s / stuff
                  :ARG1-of (f2 / free-04)))
      :snt6 (m2 / mock-01
            :ARG1 y2
            :ARG2 ii2
            :mod (j2 / just))
      :snt7 (t5 / take-01
            :mode imperative
            :ARG0 y2
            :ARG1 (s2 / seat)))

comment: Those that believe they are some kind of resistance have the mentality of year olds . The only things they are actually resisting are adult behavior and common sense . They think resisting is cool while it is actually a mark of stupidity . <URL>
amr:
# ::snt Those that believe they are some kind of resistance have the mentality of year olds . The only things they are actually resisting are adult behavior and common sense . They think resisting is cool while it is actually a mark of stupidity . <URL>
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (m2 / mentality
            :poss (p / person
                  :age (t / temporal-quantity
                        :quant 1
                        :unit (y / year)))
            :domain (p2 / person
                  :mod (t2 / that)
                  :ARG0-of (b / believe-01
                        :ARG1 (r / resist-01
                              :ARG0 p2
                              :mod (k / kind
                                    :mod (s / some))))))
      :snt2 (r2 / resist-01
            :ARG0 (t3 / they)
            :ARG1 (a / and
                  :op1 (b2 / behave-01
                        :mod (a2 / adult))
                  :op2 (s2 / sense-02
                        :mod (c / common)))
            :mod (o / only)
            :ARG1-of (a3 / actual-02))
      :snt3 (c2 / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (t4 / think-01
                  :ARG0 t3
                  :ARG1 (c3 / cool-04
                        :ARG1 (r3 / resist-01)))
            :ARG2 (m3 / mark-01
                  :ARG1 r3
                  :ARG2 (s3 / stupidity)
                  :ARG1-of (a4 / actual-02))))
